00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_DateRange extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_Date {
00025 
00034         public function check(&$check,$name,&$gp) {
00035                 $checkFailed = "";
00036 
00037                 if(isset($gp[$name]) && !empty($gp[$name])) {
00038                         $min = $check['params']['min'];
00039                         $max = $check['params']['max'];
00040                         $pattern = $check['params']['pattern'];
00041                         eregi('^[d|m|y]*(.)[d|m|y]*', $pattern, $res);
00042                         $sep = $res[1];
00043         
00044                         // normalisation of format
00045                         $pattern = $this->normalizeDatePattern($pattern,$sep);
00046         
00047                         // find out correct positioins of "d","m","y"
00048                         $pos1 = strpos($pattern, 'd');
00049                         $pos2 = strpos($pattern, 'm');
00050                         $pos3 = strpos($pattern, 'y');
00051                         $date = $gp[$name];
00052                         $checkdate = explode($sep,$date);
00053                         $check_day = $checkdate[$pos1];
00054                         $check_month = $checkdate[$pos2];
00055                         $check_year = $checkdate[$pos3];
00056                         if($min != "") {
00057                                 $min_date = explode($sep,$min);
00058                                 $min_day = $min_date[$pos1];
00059                                 $min_month = $min_date[$pos2];
00060                                 $min_year = $min_date[$pos3];
00061                                 if($check_year<$min_year) {
00062                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00063                                 } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month < $min_month) {
00064                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00065                                 } elseif ($check_year == $min_year && $check_month == $min_month && $check_day < $min_day) {
00066                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00067                                 }
00068                         }
00069                         if($max != "") {
00070                                 $max_date = explode($sep,$max);
00071                                 $max_day = $max_date[$pos1];
00072                                 $max_month = $max_date[$pos2];
00073                                 $max_year = $max_date[$pos3];
00074                                 if($check_year > $max_year) {
00075                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00076                                 } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month > $max_month) {
00077                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00078                                 } elseif ($check_year == $max_year && $check_month == $max_month && $check_day > $max_day) {
00079                                         $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00080                                 }
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 return $checkFailed;
00085         }
00086 }
